pkgmetadata.longdescription: Classify Missing Data as MCAR, MAR, or MNAR // Classify missing data as missing completely at random (MCAR), missing at random (MAR), or missing not at random (MNAR). This step is required before handling missing data (e.g. mean imputation) so that bias is not introduced. See Little (1988) doi:10.1080/01621459.1988.10478722 for the statistical rationale for the methods used.
